## Transaction.setNonce() method

Sets the account sequence number of the sender. Must be done prior signing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNonce(nonce: INonce): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nonce | [INonce](./sdk-core.inonce.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void
